amendment.description: To clarify the definition of HIV/AIDS prevention for purposes of providing funds for therapeutic medical care.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1977 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 45 - 47. Record Vote Number: 430.

action.text: Amendment SA 1977 proposed by Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S13341-13344; text: CR S13341) To clarify the definition of HIV/AIDS prevention for purposes of providing funds for therapeutic medical care.
